segments.text: You don ’ t look so good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I had spaghetti with clam sauce for lunch .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that could have been it , but I haven ’ t been feeling that great for the past few days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you under a lot of stress ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not really . Things have been going OK .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe you have a touch of the flu .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that I might be getting the flu .
segments.speaker: S2
